    A Practitioner’s Primer on Tontine Portfolios

    less than 1 minute read

    We are pleased to announce the CFA Institute Research Foundation has published Tontines: A Practitioner’s Guide to Mortality-Pooled Investments, a first of its kind primer for investment practitioners on the subject of tontine portfolios. Many thanks to the Foundation for funding this research brief.

    Available at/on:

    CFA Institute Research Foundation

    Kindle

    Apple iBook

    Google Play ​

    • Preface
    • Acknowledgements

    • Are Tontines Legal?
    • Literature

    • Fair vs. Equitable
    • Mortality Rates
    • Forfeiture Allocation

    • Tontines Compared with Income Annuities
    • Tontine Payouts
    • Structured Payouts
    • Tontine Accounting Illustrated
    • Tontine Structures
    • Additional Topics
    • Conclusion
    • References
